metadata.description: Sullivan Husk's life changed the day he was introduced to the Heartbreakr™ app and the notion that love is just another tradeable commodity. What started as a Faustian bargain to restore the good health of a dying man has become a collector's habit. But all the upgrades the app has to offer might not be enough to save Sully from this latest upset spouse.
metadata.name: Deuce of Hearts
